sdk-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
sdk-staging.post-deploy: npm i ; npm update ; grunt compile --sites=at-stake --env staging ; nvm use ; pm2 restart 0

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking at-stake-v3 and restarting app.'; git pull git@github.com:engagementgamelab/el-web-sdk.git master;
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; npm update ; cd /srv/website/current/ ; npm i ; grunt compile --sites=at-stake --env staging ; nvm use ; NODE_ENV=staging pm2 restart 0
